name: ThirdPerson
author: Davi & NotAKidoS
description: Allows you to go into third person view by pressing Ctrl + T to toggle and Ctrl + Y to cycle modes.
changelog:
- Fixed game issue where player camera culling mask was not being first reset when loading into a world with a custom reference camera specified.
- Fixed not updating stored culling mask on world join or ThirdPerson toggle.

These changes should fix the Portable Camera not displaying anything once loading into a world while in Third Person.
